directions.text: Chop up 10 garlic gloves finely and cut chard into 1 inch pieces including stalk.
Smoke 2 TBSP of oil in a large skillet over medium heat.
Cook sausage for 8 mins in skillet and cut into small bits. set aside.
Boil fettucine with salt until al dente.
Add chard and cook for 3 mins.
Drain water then add sausage, cheese, and remaining oil.
